abstract: BHP Billiton’s yearlong pursuit of its mining company rival Rio Tinto hit a major obstacle when the European antitrust authorities objected to the deal.
snippet: BHP Billiton’s yearlong pursuit of its mining company rival Rio Tinto hit a major obstacle when the European antitrust authorities objected to the deal.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  BHP Billiton’s yearlong pursuit of its mining company rival Rio Tinto hit a major obstacle on Tuesday when the European antitrust authorities objected to the deal.

headline.main: Europe Questions Merger of Mining Companies
headline.print_headline: Bid to Acquire Rio Tinto Meets Resistance in Europe

abstract: BHP Billiton‘s yearlong pursuit of its mining company rival Rio Tinto hit a major obstacle on Tuesday when the European antitrust authorities objected to the deal, David Jolly of The New York Times reported from Paris.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton‘s yearlong pursuit of its mining company rival Rio Tinto hit a major obstacle on Tuesday when the European antitrust authorities objected to the deal, David Jolly of The New York Times reported from Paris.

headline.main: Europe Questions Merger of Mining Companies
